document.full_text: kyle orton showed up to player-organized denver broncos workouts on tuesday, even if his place on the roster is suddenly in jeopardy.
document.title: kyle orton and tim tebow on broncos' roster? john elway can't say yet
lines_and_colors: kyle orton showed up to player-organized denver broncos workouts on tuesday, even if his place on the roster is suddenly in jeopardy.
